messages.subject: Unschooling as a club
messages.msgSnippet: I finally left in tears and I m sure they laughed at me until some other poor soul made the mistake of asking questions. I doubt anyone had time to laugh
messages.messageBody:
"I finally left in tears and I'm
sure they laughed at me until some other poor soul made the mistake
of asking questions."

I doubt anyone had time to laugh about anything...probably they were
just frustrated like you. Too many times, the discussions seem
personal when the poster is really talking about philosophy. But
that's neither here nor there.
Many of the same people are at several of these lists. It's best to
stick to the topic of unschooling and leave other lists to be what
they are.

Let's get back to the topic and move on please.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
